name: The Good, the Bad, and the Office
name_original: The Good, the Bad, and the Office
description:
Deadline is coming! 

Your nasty employees don't want to work. Avoid their excuses. Take your #1 boss mug from your secretary and drink enough coffee to overcome their laziness! Use a megaphone and unleash your anger! And don’t forget to avoid cats…

Become a good boss. Become a bad guy.
